alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Leavenworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 11:42PM CDT until July 05 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Leavenworth County in northeastern Kansas... Northwestern Johnson County in east central Kansas... Central Platte County in west central Missouri... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1141 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Atchison to McLouth to near Clinton Lake, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leavenworth, Lansing, Bonner Springs, De Soto, Tonganoxie, Basehor, Weston, Linwood, Easton, Reno, Fairmount, Fort Leavenworth, Stillings, Clearview City, Beverly, East Leavenworth, Lowemont and Jarbalo. This includes Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 206 and 222. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
